text: Item stopped working after 3 days. Manufacturing defect, not user damage. Past 30-day return window. Warranty coverage or exception possible?
Duplicate order return accepted. Unopened item in original packaging qualifies for full refund. No restocking fee. Return label emailed for $139 refund.
Initiated return 10 days ago via UPS Store. Tracking shows delivered to return center 5 days ago. Still no refund $249.99 processed.
Return received at center 5 days ago. Inspection complete. Processing $29.99 refund now - expect in payment method within 3-5 business days.
Accidentally ordered duplicate laptop. One unopened in original packaging. Can I return just unopened one? Need return label and refund $89.99.
Return authorized - RMA number RMA759407. Return window active 3 more days. Prepaid return label sent. Drop off at UPS Store, refund after inspection.
Need return authorization for coffee maker - doesn't fit properly. Original packaging intact, tags attached, unused condition. Bought 6 days ago.
